headline: Tell HN: Homeless encampment has now been cleared
description:
A couple weeks ago, there was an article posted here humanizing the homeless in Venice Beach [1].

The article generated a lot of buzz, especially on site. As a result, the mayor has decided to keep them out [2]. The area has been fenced and signs for construction are coming up. The article states that 44 of 66 people have been placed in homes. However, 2 days later, tents are starting to come back up outside the fence.

And the cycle continues.

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31560692 [2]: https://www.nbclosangeles.com/news/local/venice-centennial-park-homeless-encampments/2916845/
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：无家可归者的营地现已被清除
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：無家可歸者的營地現已被清除
description_zh-Hans:
几周前，有一篇文章发在这里，将威尼斯海滩的流浪者人性化[1].

这篇文章引起了很多人的讨论，尤其是在现场。结果，市长决定不让他们进入[2]。该地区已经被围起来，施工的标志也即将出现。文章说，66人中有44人已经被安置在家中。然而，2天后，帐篷又开始在围栏外出现了。

循环往复。

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31560692 [2]: https://www.nbclosangeles.com/news/local/venice-centennial-park-homeless-encampments/2916845/
description_zh-Hant:
幾周前，有一篇文章發在這裡，將威尼斯海灘的流浪者人性化[1].

這篇文章引起了很多人的討論，尤其是在現場。結果，市長決定不讓他們進入[2]。該地區已經被圍起來，施工的標誌也即將出現。文章說，66人中有44人已經被安置在家中。然而，2天后，帳篷又開始在圍欄外出現了。

循環往復。

[1]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31560692 [2]: https://www.nbclosangeles.com/news/local/venice-centennial-park-homeless-encampments/2916845/
